sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Typography, Box, List, ListItem } from '@mui/material'; const FormConfirmAddPlant = ({ plantInfo, quantityArray, setFormConfirmVisible, handleSubmit}) => { return ( Please confirm to add your new plant. Name: {plantInfo.name} Type: {plantInfo.type} {quantityArray.map(details =>( <> Description: {details.description} Price: ${details.price} Cut: {details.type} ))} ) } export default FormConfirmAddPlant;
